original_text:
Madame Destiny
Informazioni generali
Software: Pragmatic Play
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 10
Valore gettone: da 0,1 a 0,50 €
Gettoni per linea: da 1 a 10
Importo minimo della puntata: 0,10 €
Importo massimo della puntata: 50 €
Vincita massima: X 18.000 volte la puntata
Return to Player (RTP): 96,5%
Volatilità: alta
Caratteristiche principali di Madame Destiny
Il tema sviluppato da questo gioco della software house Pragmatic Play è quello dell’arte degli indovini, o meglio, dell’indovina, in questo caso. La protagonista della slot è infatti un’affascinante ragazza con tratti e abbigliamento gitano che, dotata di tutti gli “attrezzi del mestiere” si propone di svelare il futuro.
La grafica è bella, indubbiamente, un paesaggio nebbioso e tetro fa da sfondo ai rulli, mentre una musica ammaliante in sottofondo rende l’atmosfera di gioco particolarmente coinvolgente.
Quello che balza subito agli occhi, dando uno sguardo alle informazioni generali su Madame Destiny, è il potenziale di vincita davvero alto: si parla di un montepremi pari a 18.000 volte la scommessa, il che se si fanno due conti, ci fa arrivare alla notevole cifra di 900.000 €. La Pragmatic Play è stata più volte oggetto di critiche per i suoi montepremi così alti e così inarrivabili, come accaduto nel caso della prima slot della serie dell’esploratore John Hunter, che prometteva addirittura un premio pari a 48.000 volte la puntata.
Il valore del gettone va da 0,10 a 0,50 € e si possono puntare su ognuna delle dieci linee di gioco da 1 a 10 gettoni, per una scommessa massima di 50 €.
La volatilità di Madame Destiny è tra le più alte in assoluto tra le slot machine di casa Pragmatic Play, il che significa che sebbene le vincite siano abbastanza consistenti, dovrete armarvi di pazienza prima di ottenerle!
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
Sui cinque rulli di Madame Destiny, tra i simboli regolari, troviamo tutto l’armamentario per un’impeccabile lettura del futuro: abbiamo le pozioni magiche, le candele, i tarocchi, gufi e gatti neri che aggiungono un alone di stregoneria al gioco e un cuore. Oltre ai simboli tematici, come di consueto sono presenti i numeri e le lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso.
Per quanto riguarda invece i simboli speciali, Madame Destiny in persona rappresenta il Wild del gioco e come tale può rimpiazzare tutti gli altri simboli, ad eccezione dello Scatter, nel completamento di una combinazione vincente. Tutti gli allineamenti vincenti ottenuti grazie al Wild usufruiscono di un moltiplicatore x2.
La Scatter invece è una sfera di cristallo: quando compare per almeno tre volte sui rulli, a prescindere dalla posizione occupata, permette di accedere a 15 giri gratuiti. Anche quando si stanno giocando i Free Spins, se appare di nuovo lo Scatter, sempre per tre volte, si otterranno ulteriori 15 giri gratuiti nei quali tutte le vincite saranno moltiplicate x3.
Slot simili a Madame Destiny
Il tema della magia e della veggenza ha ammaliato anche le principali software house: tra le slot che si ispirano al mondo della divinazione ricordiamo Ancorina della Capecod e Gipsy Moon della Spielo, che è davvero molto simile a Madame Destiny, non solo per la tematica ma anche per la grafica e la scelta dei simboli.

raw_translation.response:
Madame Destiny
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Coin value: 0.1 to 0.5 €
Coins per line: 1 to 10
Minimum bet amount: 0.10 €
Maximum bet amount: 50 €
Maximum payout: X 18,000 times the bet
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: high
Key Features of Madame Destiny
The theme developed by Pragmatic Play's game is that of the art of fortune telling, or rather, of the fortune teller, in this case. The protagonist of the slot is a charming girl with Gypsy features and clothing who, equipped with all the "tools of the trade", sets out to reveal the future.
The graphics are beautiful, undoubtedly, with a foggy and dark landscape in the background of the reels, while an enchanting music in the background makes the game atmosphere particularly engaging.
What immediately catches the eye, when looking at the general information about Madame Destiny, is the really high winning potential: we are talking about a jackpot equal to 18,000 times the bet, which if we do the math, brings us to a remarkable amount of 900,000 €. Pragmatic Play has been criticized several times for its jackpots being so high and unattainable, as happened in the case of the first slot in the series of explorer John Hunter, which promised a prize equal to 48,000 times the bet.
The coin value ranges from 0.10 to 0.50 € and you can bet on each of the ten paylines from 1 to 10 coins, for a maximum bet of 50 €.
Madame Destiny's volatility is among the highest of all Pragmatic Play slot machines, which means that although the wins are quite substantial, you will need to have patience before obtaining them!
Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters
On the five reels of Madame Destiny, among the regular symbols, we find everything necessary for impeccable fortune telling: we have magic potions, candles, tarot cards, owls, and black cats adding an aura of witchcraft to the game, as well as a heart. In addition to the thematic symbols, as usual, there are numbers and letters that refer to poker cards from 9 to Ace.
As for the special symbols, Madame Destiny herself represents the Wild of the game and as such can replace all other symbols, except for the Scatter, in completing a winning combination. All winning combinations obtained thanks to the Wild benefit from a x2 multiplier.
The Scatter, on the other hand, is a crystal ball: when it appears at least three times on the reels, regardless of the position occupied, it allows access to 15 free spins. Even when playing Free Spins, if the Scatter appears again, also three times, you will obtain an additional 15 free spins in which all winnings will be multiplied x3.
Slots similar to Madame Destiny
The theme of magic and divination has also fascinated the main software companies: among the slots inspired by the world of divination, we remember Ancorina by Capecod and Gipsy Moon by Spielo, which is very similar to Madame Destiny, not only for the theme but also for graphics and symbol choices.

Review: Madame Destiny
General Information
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Coin value: 0.1 to 0.5 €
Coins per line: 1 to 10
Minimum bet amount: 0.10 €
Maximum bet amount: 50 €
Maximum payout: X 18,000 times the bet
Return to Player (RTP): 96.5%
Volatility: high
Key Features of Madame Destiny
The theme developed by Pragmatic Play's game is that of the art of fortune telling, or rather, of the fortune teller, in this case. The protagonist of the slot is a charming girl with Gypsy features and clothing who, equipped with all the "tools of the trade", sets out to reveal the future.
The graphics are beautiful, undoubtedly, with a foggy and dark landscape in the background of the reels, while an enchanting music in the background makes the game atmosphere particularly engaging.
What immediately catches the eye, when looking at the general information about Madame Destiny, is the really high winning potential: we are talking about a jackpot equal to 18,000 times the bet, which if we do the math, brings us to a remarkable amount of 900,000 €. Pragmatic Play has been criticized several times for its jackpots being so high and unattainable, as happened in the case of the first slot in the series of explorer John Hunter, which promised a prize equal to 48,000 times the bet.
The coin value ranges from 0.10 to 0.50 € and you can bet on each of the ten paylines from 1 to 10 coins, for a maximum bet of 50 €.
Madame Destiny's volatility is among the highest of all Pragmatic Play slot machines, which means that although the wins are quite substantial, you will need to have patience before obtaining them!
Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters
On the five reels of Madame Destiny, among the regular symbols, we find everything necessary for impeccable fortune telling: we have magic potions, candles, tarot cards, owls, and black cats adding an aura of witchcraft to the game, as well as a heart. In addition to the thematic symbols, as usual, there are numbers and letters that refer to poker cards from 9 to Ace.
As for the special symbols, Madame Destiny herself represents the Wild of the game and as such can replace all other symbols, except for the Scatter, in completing a winning combination. All winning combinations obtained thanks to the Wild benefit from a x2 multiplier.
The Scatter, on the other hand, is a crystal ball: when it appears at least three times on the reels, regardless of the position occupied, it allows access to 15 free spins. Even when playing Free Spins, if the Scatter appears again, also three times, you will obtain an additional 15 free spins in which all winnings will be multiplied x3.
Slots similar to Madame Destiny
The theme of magic and divination has also fascinated the main software companies: among the slots inspired by the world of divination, we remember Ancorina by Capecod and Gipsy Moon by Spielo, which is very similar to Madame Destiny, not only for the theme but also for graphics and symbol choices.

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Madame Destiny, developed by Pragmatic Play, is a 5-reel, 10-payline slot game with a high volatility that promises a really high winning potential, equal to 18,000 times the bet. Players can choose a coin value from 0.1 € to 0.5 € and bet from 1 to 10 coins per line, with a maximum bet of 50 €. The protagonist of the game is a fortune teller who uses tarot cards, magic potions, candles, owls, and black cats. The game includes Wild and Scatter symbols, and free spins with a x3 multiplier for additional Scatter symbols.

Graphics and Design

Madame Destiny is a beautifully designed slot game, with a foggy and dark landscape in the background of the reels that adds an air of mystery, while an enchanting music in the background makes the game atmosphere particularly engaging. The game's theme is well-executed and the symbols are visually appealing, including Madame Destiny herself, with Gypsy features and clothing, tarot cards, magic potions, candles, owls, and black cats. The graphics and animations are top-notch, without being too distracting for the player. Overall, the game provides an immersive experience for the player, with a mystical aura that matches the theme.

Payout and Volatility

Madame Destiny has a really high winning potential, equal to 18,000 times the bet, which makes it appealing to players who prefer high-risk, high-reward games. However, with a high volatility, players may need patience before hitting winning combinations, but the payouts can be quite substantial when they do hit. The return to player (RTP) for this game is 96.5%, which is in line with industry standards and ensures a fair chance for players to win.

Special Symbols

Madame Destiny includes two special symbols that add to the gameplay experience. The Wild symbol is Madame Destiny herself, which can replace any other symbol to complete winning combinations, except for the Scatter symbol. All winning combinations obtained with the Wild symbol are multiplied by x2. The Scatter symbol is a crystal ball and, when it appears at least three times on the reels, it triggers 15 free spins. During these free spins, all winnings are multiplied by x3. Players can also re-trigger the free spins if they land three or more Scatter symbols during this feature.

Comparison to Similar Slot Games

The theme of magic and fortune telling has inspired several slot games, but Madame Destiny stands out for its immersive atmosphere, beautifully designed symbols, and seriously high winning potential. The high volatility could pose a challenge for some players, but with a maximum payout of 18,000 times the bet, the game offers the possibility of life-changing rewards. Similar slots include Gipsy Moon by Spielo, which shares the same theme and some symbol choices, and Ancorina by Capecod, which features a fortune teller and has a similar atmosphere, but with lower payouts and less intriguing symbols.
